ERIA examines the effect of education on capacity building in various ways, such as development capacity, innovation capability, and managerial efficiency. ERIA&rsquo;s studies also delve into the effects of higher education, learning centres, and technology transfers, among others.</p>";s:13:"external_link";s:1:"0";s:10:"image_name";s:39:"/uploads/topics/education_245320060.jpg";s:9:"published";s:1:"1";s:8:"order_id";s:3:"500";s:13:"meta_keywords";s:135:"education, development capacity, innovation capability, managerial efficiency, higher education, learning centres, technology transfers";s:16:"meta_description";s:63:"ERIA studies education and its spillover effects on development";s:13:"modified_date";s:19:"2018-03-15 09:39:49";s:11:"modified_by";s:1:"4";s:7:"old_url";N;}s:1:"g";a:0:{}s:1:"e";O:8:"DateTime":3:{s:4:"date";s:26:"2023-02-25 15:25:20.225662";s:13:"timezone_type";i:3;s:8:"timezone";s:13:"Europe/Berlin";}s:1:"m";N;s:1:"c";N;}
